common.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this?

landing.hero_subtitle: Designed for privacy, simplicity, and performance. Track your progress, manage your devices, and analyze your shots.
landing.feat_tracking_desc: Record detailed scores, ammunition info, and technical notes for every session.
landing.feat_private_desc: Your data stays on your device by default. Cloud sync is entirely optional — you decide whether your data ever leaves your phone.
landing.feat_stopwatch_desc: Integrated stopwatch for precise training timing and series control.
landing.feat_issf_desc: Main ISSF disciplines included and ready to use.
landing.prem_timer_desc: With times per series/shot to train at the range.
landing.prem_excel_desc: Analyze your performance deeper with simple data export.
landing.prem_unlimited_desc: Record all your history without limits.
landing.prem_custom_desc: Create your own or disable default ones to fit your needs.
landing.whitelabel_desc: If you want your own customized version of TriggerTime, with your logo, specific disciplines, and any other functionality you want to add, contact us for a quote.
landing.contact_subtitle: We're here to support you. If you found a bug or have suggestions, reach out to us.

auth.login_subtitle: Sign in to manage your devices and subscription.
auth.register_subtitle: Join TriggerTime to sync your Pro+ features.

dashboard.dashboard_subtitle: Manage your account, devices and pro features.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.info_subtitle: Update your name and primary language.
profile.security_subtitle: Ensure your account is using a long, random password.
profile.b2b_subtitle: Licenses associated with your email for special instances.

devices.title: Device Management
devices.subtitle: Manage your authorized TriggerTime devices.
devices.token_help: Enter the 6-character token from your mobile app.
devices.unlink_confirm: Are you sure you want to unlink this device? You will lose access to Pro features on it.

subscription.title: Subscription Plans
subscription.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your training needs.
subscription.free_plan_desc: Everything you need to start tracking your shooting sessions.
subscription.pro_plan_desc: Unlock the full potential of TriggerTime with advanced features.
subscription.multi_device_sync: Sync your data across all your devices — entirely optional, you stay in control
subscription.advanced_analytics: Full access to historical shooting analytics, trends, and charts
subscription.priority_support: Priority support and early access to new features
subscription.unlimited_sessions: Unlimited session history with no restrictions
subscription.activated_desc: Thank you for upgrading. Your Pro+ features are now unlocked.
subscription.canceled_desc: Your subscription has been canceled but remains active until {date}. After this date, you will lose Pro+ features.
subscription.ending_soon: Ending soon: Your subscription will end on {date}.

admin.setup_desc: We are currently provisioning your application instance. You will be notified via email once the setup is complete and your environment is ready.
admin.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to soft delete this user? They will no longer be able to log in or access the dashboard.
admin.instance_help: Linking an instance grants this user administrative control over its activation licenses.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy for TriggerTime
privacy.intro_text: Welcome to TriggerTime. We value and respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle information within our application. The core principle of our app is that we do not collect, transmit, or share your personal information with anyone.
privacy.collection_text: Our application does not require user account registration for basic offline use. We do not request or collect personally identifiable information (such as name, email address, phone number, or precise GPS location) for the local use of the application.
privacy.training_text: The primary function of TriggerTime is to help you record and analyze your sports performance.
privacy.data_type_text: The app allows you to input technical data related to your shooting practice (scores, training dates, ammunition types, equipment notes, etc.).
privacy.storage_text: Unless you explicitly choose to sync to the cloud via a Pro+ account, all information you enter is stored exclusively locally on your device's internal memory.
privacy.transfer_text: Since the application operates entirely offline primarily:
privacy.transfer_item_1: We do not send your data to external servers or the "cloud" unless you opt-in for syncing.
privacy.transfer_item_2: We (the developer) do not have access to your training data or historical logs.
privacy.transfer_item_3: If you delete the application from your device without an active sync, the stored data will be permanently deleted.
privacy.permissions_text: To function correctly, the application may request access to certain native features of your device. These permissions are used strictly for the app's functionality and not to collect data about you:
privacy.permissions_storage_text: To save the database of your scores and training sessions on the device.
privacy.third_party_text: This application does not use third-party analytics services or advertising networks that track user behavior. High privacy standards are fundamental to our mission.
privacy.changes_text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
privacy.contact_text: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at {email}.

notFound.title: Oops! You missed the target.
notFound.message: We looked everywhere, but it seems this page has gone rogue. Maybe it's hiding behind a barricade? Or maybe you just typed the wrong coordinates.
